game.name: Working Class Monsters
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Heroes destroyed your kingdom. Your monsters need jobs. Draft workers from card packs, place them strategically, watch your economy grow. Unlock powerful upgrades and expand your territory. A casual incremental journey with a definite ending.
